long_description: The insulated Patagonia Down sweater vest delivers reliable core warmth that's so light and comfortable, boys will forget they're wearing it. Ripstop polyester shell is tear resistant and windproof; water-repellent finish causes snow and rain to bead up and roll off. Premium European 600-fill-power goose down insulation is extremely warm, lightweight and compressible. Down Sweater vest has a full-zip front, windflap, zippered hand pockets with reflective zipper pulls and an ID label inside. Also features an internal zippered drop-in pocket, comfortable quilted-through construction and an internal drawcord at the hem.
short_description: The insulated Patagonia Down sweater vest delivers reliable core warmth that's so light and comfortable, boys will forget they're wearing it.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
